ValidationRule.description: Prevents moving back to stages before await terms once scope has been signed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( StageName ), "Await terms" ) && ( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Book discovery" ) || ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Present discovery" ) || ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Await decision" )) && ( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Advice_Opportunity" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "AdviceFastTrack" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot move backwards in stages.
